'''''Scent on the Wind''''' is a [[World Quest]] that occurs in [[Mondstadt City|Mondstadt]], [[Mondstadt]].
==Steps==
Pass by [[Good Hunter]] in [[Mondstadt]] to start the quest.
#Purchase [[Fisherman's Toast]]

==Gameplay Notes==
*Step 1 is automatically completed if the player has [[Fisherman's Toast]] in their [[Inventory]] regardless of getting close to [[Good Hunter]].

==Dialogue==
{{Quest Description|As you walk through [[Mondstadt]], [[Paimon]] is attracted by the aroma of food...}}
{{Dialogue Start}}
;(Passing by the Good Hunter)
:{{A|vo tips shop paimon 01.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Ooh!
:{{A|vo tips shop paimon 02.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Paimon can smell Fisherman's Toast!
:{{A|vo tips shop paimon 03.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Mmmm! The aroma is coming from Good Hunter!
:{{A|vo tips shop paimon 04.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' A thick slice of soft white toast...
:{{A|vo tips shop paimon 05.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Topped with a generous serving of onion slices, lightly caramelized by the toasting... Yum yum!
:{{A|vo tips shop paimon 06.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Paimon's made up her mind!
:{{A|vo tips shop paimon 07.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' It's an emergency! We must order ourselves a generous serving of Fisherman's Toast from Good Hunter, pronto!
:{{A|vo tips shop paimon 08.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' It's on you, of course!
:;(After acquiring a Fisherman's Toast)
:{{A|vo tips shop paimon 09.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' It's so delicious! *om nom nom*
:{{A|vo tips shop paimon 10.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Good Hunter's Fisherman's Toast is the best!
:{{A|vo tips shop paimon 11.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' This might surprise you, but it's actually a classic Mondstadt recipe that anyone can cook.
:{{A|vo tips shop paimon 12.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' You can try cooking it yourself if you have the ingredients.
:{{A|vo tips shop paimon 13.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Can Traveler's cooking skills surpass that of Good Hunter's?
:{{A|vo tips shop paimon 14.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Why, Paimon would love to be your personal taster!
:{{A|vo tips shop paimon 15.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Don't let me down!
{{Dialogue End}}
